name: Crappy TD
description:
Inputs - Built for touch so to simulate a 2 finger zoom, hold Ctrl + left mouse click and drag to zoom in/out !
click n drag to pan around the scene!

May take up to 2 min to load the first time.

Android play store version has leaderboards where you can attempt min-maxing your score, and interstitial adds on a 15 min cooldown :P  

A game where you protect your home and resources from the few enemies I had time to create.
Strategize, place and upgrade towers to keep unfriendly creatures away.
no gore, enemies just vanish and its easier on this indie dev.

As my first game, of course its gonna be crappy, I have a lot to learn,
any feedback and criticism is much appreciated.

Thanks for playing, hope you like it!
